title: Magic Water Circuit with Dinner
description: Experience a sound and light extravaganza to remember on this fountains tour with dinner and a show in Lima. Following pickup at your accommodation in downtown Lima, Miraflores, or San Isidro, transfer to the Magic Water Circuit—where enormous jets of water explode into the skies to music and lights. You’ll also have time for a delicious dinner inside a historic 100-year-old house museum.
all_descriptions: Experience a sound and light extravaganza to remember on this fountains tour with dinner and a show in Lima. Following pickup at your accommodation in downtown Lima, Miraflores, or San Isidro, transfer to the Magic Water Circuit—where enormous jets of water explode into the skies to music and lights. You’ll also have time for a delicious dinner inside a historic 100-year-old house museum.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Circuito Magico Del Agua, Jr. Madre de Dios Parque de la Reserva, Lima 15046 PeruA modern system of fountains certified as the largest in the world by the Guinness World Records. Built in Exhibition Park, the Magical Water Circuit attracts crowds during summer and winter, being one of the new favourite attractions of Lima.Duration: 1 hour 20 minutesStop At:Centro Historico de Lima, Plaza de Armas, Lima 15001 PeruTaste a traditional peruvian food in a 100-year-old house museum.Duration: 1 hour 20 minutes

reviews.title: It was a great night.  We had lots of fun together.  Realy enjoyed all the fountains and water features.   I would recommend for
reviews.text: It was very nice.  I liked the history, the fountains and all the colors.  There was 13 fountains the children were having a great time.

reviews.title: Highly recommend this tour!
reviews.text: Our guide did a great job of touring the fountains before the show.  He found a great place right in the middle to watch the show on a crowded Friday night.  The cultural buffet was not available, so we were taken to Cafe Tambo instead.  The cafe was excellent and had a good selection on the preset menu.  The guide was very knowledgeable and the driver was excellent navigating through Lima traffic.  I would highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: Spectacular!
reviews.text: The fountains show was really magical, the bus comfortable, guide&driver friendly, dance show and horse show spectacular!

reviews.title: Fabulous fountains and water show and fun folkloric show.
reviews.text: I very much enjoyed the show and was pleasantly surprised to see the Paso horses. The guide, Vienna was excellent. I was only person on the tour and it was not cancelled for lack of interest. Thank you. The fountains and water show was really great.it was also really nice to have transportation provided.

reviews.title: Fun adventure
reviews.text: Picked up from hotel and driven to magic water circuit fountains and light show.  Fun group of 9 and our guide was wonderful.  Beautiful fountains great show with lights and music then on to a buffet dinner and folklore show.  Good food great show.  Delivered back to hotel safe and sound.

reviews.title: Beautiful Fountains with an incredible dinner
reviews.text: Being able to visit the Magic water circuit to watch the unforgettable magic water show is a must when visiting Lima. The dinner and show provided after the show was filled with delicious Peruvian cuisine and a wonderful dance to watch. The only aspect of this experience I think could have been improved was that I would have liked to spend more time at the Magic Water circuit. It should be noted though that this was not because of the tour guides themselves. Unfortunately, some of the other participants were late causing us to leave later than planned, thus shortening our available time at the magic water circuit. That being said, if you have timely traveling partners, it may provide that extra time that I wish we would have had.
